title: Copy Edit a Feature Story
description: An editor needs to review a long-form feature story for grammar, style, clarity, and adherence to the publication's style guide.

tasks.description: Read through the entire article to get a sense of the narrative and structure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Editor understands the story's main points and flow.

tasks.description: Perform a line-by-line edit, correcting all grammatical errors, typos, and punctuation mistakes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The document is free of basic errors.

tasks.description: Check the article against the publication's internal style guide (e.g., AP Style) and correct any inconsistencies.
tasks.expected_outcome: The article conforms to all house style rules.
